body_html:
i got same error, but with caffe !, i installed cuda 8 and for some application it worked fine but for caffe this issue got me confusing, if someone helped this please share your solutions :

body:
i got same error, but with caffe !, i installed cuda 8 and for some application it worked fine but for caffe this issue got me confusing, if someone helped this please share your solutions :

Traceback (most recent call last):
